ModMetaData.name: Medieval Extras
ModMetaData.author: Satpyn
ModMetaData.description:
Medieval Extras
Minor cosmetic additions for Medieval Overhaul mod. List of changes:
- New textures:
brewery fermenting barrel passive cooler vent sculpting table tool cabinet fueled smithing table fueled cooking table hand tailoring workbench
- Added two archways for double doors (wooden and stone) and a single stone archway,
